title.rendered: Fabrice Croiseaux Joins Tokeny as Member of the Board

content.rendered:
Luxembourg – Tokeny, the market-leading tokenization platform, has announced Fabrice Croiseaux has joined as a Member of the Board. Fabrice Croiseaux is currently CEO of InTech, a subsidiary of POST Luxembourg Group dedicated to Software Development and IT Consulting. Fabrice brings with him over 20 years experience in the development of software.

Luc Falempin, CEO of Tokeny commented, “We’re delighted to have Fabrice on board. We share the same vision that the decentralized infrastructure of blockchain technologies will help financial markets gain cost efficiency and help draw in new classes of investors. Having Fabrice join the team, with his great amount of experience building technology teams and leading complex IT projects, will help us hugely as we look to scale.”

 

Fabrice Croiseaux, mentioned, “I’m thrilled to join Tokeny as a Member of the Board. We’ve been working together since the inception of Tokeny one year ago and to make my involvement official is tremendously exciting. I hope to play a big role with Tokeny’s upcoming projects and helping the business on its road to a tokenized future.”

About Tokeny

The Luxembourg based fintech company is the market-leader in delivering an institutional grade, secure end-to-end platform, allowing for the issuance and servicing management of tokenized securities.

Tokeny utilizes their proprietary T-REX (Token for Regulated EXchanges) infrastructure to ensure compliance from the issuance of tokenized securities to their lifecycle management. Tokeny provides the technical solutions to onboard investors, manage corporate actions such as dividends, voting, and announcements. Their solutions ensure continuity with regards to KYC and AML compliance checks, ensuring all participants are eligible for the investment.

Tokeny’s solution leverages blockchain technology and couples it with decades of experience from the traditional securities world. Tokeny utilizes this background to make the participation of any contributor in a security token offering transparent, accessible, and completely secure.
